DOC.brief_title: Postplacental Mirena IUD Insertion Estimating Expulsion Rates .
DOC.detailed_description: The average expulsion rate 6 week postpartum IUD insertion approximately 10-12 % range 3-20 % 1 year . An acceptable expulsion rate postplacental insertion ( PPI ) define varies study . There limited data expulsion rate levonorgestrel intrauterine system . Expulsion rate range widely 1-3 % high 30-40 % depend IUD study . Studies report average rate expulsion range approximate 10-12 % , similar 6 week insertion rate . There many limitation publish study include use old model IUDs long use , multiple insertion technique deem ineffective reduce expulsion rate well vary follow time make comparison expulsion rate difficult .
